Which set of tasks would meet this requirement?

questions.question_text:
A user needs to perform a one-time backup of an Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume that is attached to an Amazon EC2 instance.

What is the MOST operationally efficient way to perform this backup?
Which tool should a developer use to integrate AWS service features directly into an application?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is the answer.

Selected Answer: A
A is correct, also referred to as an SDK.

Selected Answer: B
The AWS service that can be used to identify underutilized Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volumes is AWS Trusted Advisor. AWS Trusted Advisor provides various checks to help optimize AWS resources, including EBS volumes. The EBS volumes check provides recommendations for optimizing Amazon EBS volumes, including identifying underutilized volumes.

Selected Answer: B
B is the answer.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.

Which AWS service should the company use to meet this requirement?
